name: [ in silentio ]
description:
~ in silence ~
.
.
"a tense rhythm is shattered when the moonlight shows her light,
quietly became one with the remaining night...

I promised you a peaceful remedy for your burden,
I promised you the beauty of the uncertainty...
I promised you the scariest yet the prettiest memoir...

and here I am now, walking alongside you,
never late, and never will
never part, and never will..."
--040816
.
.
Graphite pencils on paper.
2400 x 2400 pixel.
.
.
.
Note:
I created this when I was in the gloomiest mood,
when I just wanted to keep my distance from the world,
in a quiet mind of mine, in my own darkness.
A part of me kept telling me the story above,
ask me to dance with my own demon.
As a reminder that it's beautiful to be alive.
.
.
.
